description.full: This game was classified by the community with the following category scores - Violence=1/3, Sex=0/3, Mature Content=1/3. What's the most action-packed part of any game? Boss fights! Fritter and Waste won't slow you down with a heavy story line or an endless grind. In either single player or 2 player co-op mode, fight boss after boss and their minion horde in this action-oriented MMO-gameplay inspired game.
description.short: What's the most action-packed part of any game? Boss fights! Fritter and Waste won't slow you down with a heavy story line or an endless grind. In either single player or 2 player co-op mode, fight boss after boss and their minion horde in this action-oriented MMO-gameplay inspired game.
